entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Summerland
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:40 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Summerland 09:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022
Temperature: -4.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -7.8°C
Wind: ENE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this morning then periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Risk of freezing rain this afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries mixed with ice pellets. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Flurries and ice pellets with risk of freezing rain. Wind south 30 km/h. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022
